author: IBM Technology
description:
Ready to become a certified watsonx AI Assistant Engineer? Register now and use code IBMTechYT20 for 20% off of your exam → https://ibm.biz/BdnKPy

Learn more about Large Language Models (LLMs) here → https://ibm.biz/BdnKPS

Struggling to choose the right Large Language Model? 🤔 Cedric Clyburn explains how to evaluate LLMs like GPT, Llama, and Granite for tasks like summarization and coding. Discover benchmarks, RAG workflows, and open-source tools to optimize performance, cost, and flexibility for production use! 🚀

AI news moves fast. Sign up for a monthly newsletter for AI updates from IBM → https://www.ibm.com/account/reg/us-en/signup?formid=news-urx-52120

#largelanguagemodels #llm #aidevelopment
title: How to Choose Large Language Models: A Developer’s Guide to LLMs
